data.title: Very small
data.text: This is a very small place to eat in Down town Ontario. The food is average. Very friendly place to eat and visit with others.

data.title: Jeri Collins
data.text: By far the best burger combo anywhere and you cannot get better customer service anywhere. The owner Sherry treats you as a family member. We go at least once a week.

data.title: Great Burger & Fries
data.text: My daughters and I ate there last Sat. and the food was fabulous.  We all had burgers and fries, and all of us were impressed.  My 6 year old granddaughter just likes to eat the hamburger patty, and she even said it was the best she ever had.  The fires are crinkle cut, and oh so crispy.  We will definitely be going back to Daddy-O's!!!

data.title: The Best Double Cheeseburger Ever!  Not Kidding.
data.text: The owner was fantastic.  The place has an old town feel to it.  The food is beyond excellent.  And they serve Thrifty Ice Cream!  Give it a try.

data.title: #BestBurgerEver
data.text: My husband and I were taking a daycation and decided to go to downtown Upland to check out the antique shops.  We came across this little 50s style burger cafe and loved it. Hot rod pictures, 50s decor, very cool.  We split a hamburger combo (we are watching our weight) and they gladly cut it in two and even served the halves in separate baskets for us.  The burger rivals any burger we have had at In 'N' Out, and I would say is even a little better!  Sheri, the owner, has formulated her own special seasonings that she sprinkles on the burgers when she cooks them--that way folks with high blood pressure don't have to miss out on a fabulous burger. She made us feel right at home and even gave us a free refill on the coke we shared, and then a free ice cream!  Oh, and the hamburger bun was best I have ever had. #BestBurgerEver #NewFavoriteCafe

data.title: Good old Americana food
data.text:
We heard the burgers were the best ever from people walking around the Uplands Farmer Market. We we had to try it WOW the best burger ever . Very fresh ingredients hand made patty good and juicy when you get it. The Fries were very good seasoned just right . Sherry the owner is always smiling making you feel right at home. We are going back soon to try other menu items.
The cool thing about this place they seem to always have an old custom car somewhere in sight. Beside this area of Upland  is very cool to walk around .
